Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Enywe Abasuubili, abamanyiekhwo inganga yitsa okhubahonia nende eshinyasio eshilulu
Musubilenje Nyasaye nende Omurumwa wuwe, ne mukhalabanenje khunjila ya Nyasaye khu miandu chienyu nende emioyo chienyu ako ni amalayi khwinywe nikaba mbu mwakhamanya
Alabaleshela ebionoono bienyu, ne alabenjisia mwikulu mumikunda chiburanga hasi wachio emialo nende eshimenyo eshilayi mumukunda kwa Eden, okho nikhwo okhubura okhukhongo
Ne eshindi shibachamisia, obukhoonyi okhurula khu Nyasaye nende obushili buli hambi, ne suubisia Abasuubili

Enywe Abasubili mube abahabini ba Nyasaye, Shinga Yesu yareeba abechi bebe, mbu niwina umuhabini wanje khu Nyasaye ? abechi be nibaboola mbu Efwe khuli abahabini ba Nyasaye‚Äù Mana nikusuubila omukanda okhurula mubana ba Israil, ne okundi nikukhaya, kho nikhukhoonya kulia okwasuubila khubasuku bakwo, nikushila
